DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized , Subject-Assessor Blind , Multi-center , Comparative Clinical Trial evaluate efficacy safety Inject BMP Patients Undergoing Transforaminal Lumbar Interbody Fusion .
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-center , Comparative Clinical Trial Evaluate Efficacy Safety Inject BMP Patients Undergoing Transforaminal Lumbar Interbody Fusion
DOC.criteria: The subject need infusion first lumbar vertebrato first ilium require posterior spinal instrumentation interbody fusion follow reason , Spinal stenosis Spinal disc herniation require broad laminectomy Spondylolisthesis spondylolysis Recurrent herniated disc Patients BMD Tscore < 3.0 Women pregnant plan pregnant within study period
